title: KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - ETL Certified Ceramic Portable Heater Fan, Ideal for Home/Dorm/Office/Kitchen, Black; indoor, electric, size: 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13"; weight: 2.6 pounds, three modes: heating 750W, heating 1500W, air circulation; safety: automatically turns off at 45 degrees; delivers heating in 2 seconds, PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient), noise below 45 dB
descriptions:
Introducing the KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - your ultimate solution for staying warm and cozy! This ETL certified, portable heater fan is perfect for any indoor space, whether you're snuggling up at home, studying in your dorm, working in the office, or cooking in the kitchen.

Featuring a sleek black design, this compact space heater measures just 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13" and weighs a mere 2.6 pounds, making it easy to move from room to room. And with three convenient modes - 750W heating, 1500W heating, and air circulation - you can customize your comfort to suit your needs.

But what really sets the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater apart is its advanced safety features. With overheat protection and tip-over protection that automatically shuts off the heater at a 45-degree angle, you can rest easy knowing that you and your loved ones are safe.

And let's not forget about the PTC ceramic heating element, which delivers fast and efficient heating in just 2 seconds. Plus, with a noise level below 45 dB, this heater is so quiet you'll barely notice it's there.

So why wait? Upgrade your indoor heating game with the KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat today!
